law.catch_line: The governing body of Queen Anne's County and the governing body of a municipal corporation in Queen...

text.section:
The governing body of Queen Anne's County shall grant a property tax credit under this section against the county property tax imposed on real property that is:
owned by the Maryland Jaycees, Incorporated; and
used as the principal office of the organization.

section.section:
The governing body of Queen Anne's County may grant, by law, a property tax credit under this section against the county property tax imposed on real property owned by a business that:
makes significant real property improvements in the county, including construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation, or expansion of a nonresidential structure; and
employs at least 25 new additional full-time employees.
The governing body of Queen Anne's County may further define, fix, or limit the amount, terms, scope, and duration of any credit authorized under this subsection.

The governing body of Queen Anne's County may grant, by law, a property tax credit under this subsection against the county property tax imposed on real property that is owned by a foster parent of a child.
